Posts.Content: I am now theee years post op and nearly three years post radiotherapy. I took Tamoxifen for 2.5 years and am now on Anastrasole. When I was diagnosed I weighed ten stone and now over thirteen stone. I have followed and attended slimming world plan all of this time. I exercise regularly and am just stressed and depressed with all of this. I hate myself being like this but seem to be totally stuck in a big dark hole. My GP keeps saying don’t worry and the Oncologist is also not concerned, none of this helps. Has anyone else been down this road?
Posts.Title: Weight Issues

Posts.Content: I have chronic nerve pain following radiotherapy (August) and I am taking strong pain control. I would love to hear others' experiences with this as it's absolutely horrible - my pain threshold is usually very high but I've Bex experienced anything like this . . .Â
Posts.Title: Chronic nerve pain
